ipDeptAgent.name: IP Dept Agent
ipDeptAgent.ability: Act: Place 1 stun on any card your cards threaten. Repeat this ability for each revealed card your opponent has in play.
ipDeptAgent.flavorText: - "You've violated copyright. Open the door. We have a search warrant."

tacticalAgent.name: Tactical Agent
tacticalAgent.ability: Act: Destroy a card on the battlefield if it has a aim or threat.

patrolAgent.name: Patrol Agent
patrolAgent.ability: Trg: When this card gives points, you may move it to any free cell.
patrolAgent.flavorText: They say the city never sleeps. We make sure it doesn't even blink.

riotAgent.name: Riot Agent
riotAgent.ability:
Support ⇒ Act: Place 1 stun on adjacent card. 
Act: Push an adjacent card 1 cell. Мay take its place.
riotAgent.flavorText: - "Gatherings of more than two people are prohibited!"

threatAnalyst.name: Threat Analyst
threatAnalyst.ability:
Support ⇒ Exploit. 
Act: Reveal a card in your opponents' hands for each card your opponents play with your exploit.
threatAnalyst.flavorText: Gatherings of more than two people are prohibited!

recklessProvocateur.name: Reckless Provocateur
recklessProvocateur.ability:
Int: From hand swap with another of your cards. 
1 stun on an adjacent card with a threat.
recklessProvocateur.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

dataLiberator.name: Data Liberator
dataLiberator.ability:
Pas: Cards with your exploit counters give you points.
Support ⇒ Exploit.
dataLiberator.flavorText: - "Information doesn't want to be free. It needs to be."

cautiousAvenger.name: Cautious Avenger
cautiousAvenger.ability:
Act: Destroy a card on the battlefield if it has a aim and no support. 
Support ⇒ Aim.
cautiousAvenger.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

vigilantSpotter.name: Vigilant Spotter
vigilantSpotter.ability:
Trg: When a revealed card ETB, aim at it and gain 1 point. 
Support ⇒ Act: Reveal 2 cards in your opponents' hands.
vigilantSpotter.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

inventiveMaker.name: Inventive Maker
inventiveMaker.ability: Act: Place the Recon Drone token in a free adjacent cell.
inventiveMaker.flavorText: - "Patience is a weapon. Vengeance is an art."

faber.name: Faber
faber.ability: Act: Place the Walking Turret card in a free adjacent cell.
faber.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

censor.name: Censor
censor.ability:
Act: Exploit for any card with a threat.
Swap any exploit for stun or aim.
censor.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

princeps.name: Princeps
princeps.ability:
Act: Destroy a card in a row if it has a target or threat. 
Support ⇒ Shield 1.
princeps.flavorText: Order is not requested. It is imposed.

immunis.name: Immunis
immunis.ability: Act: Return Optimat from the discard pile to the adjacent cell. Activate his ability and he gets 2 stuns.
immunis.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

centurion.name: Centurion
centurion.ability: Trg: When you play a command, get 1 point for each card you have in the same row as that card.
centurion.flavorText: In the gilded halls of the Optimates, even the tools of war are works of art.

codeKeeper.name: Code Keeper
codeKeeper.ability: Act: Exploit each opponent's cards with a threat in the same row as that card.
codeKeeper.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

devoutSynthetic.name: Devout Synthetic
devoutSynthetic.ability:
Act: Push an adjacent card 1 cell. May take its place.
Support ⇒ Destroy.
devoutSynthetic.flavorText: Flesh is a bug. The Signal is the patch.

unwaveringIntegrator.name: Unwavering Integrator
unwaveringIntegrator.ability:
Support ⇒ Exploit.
Act: Gain 1 point for each of your exploit counter.
unwaveringIntegrator.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

signalProphet.name: Signal Prophet
signalProphet.ability:
Act: Exploit on every card you have with a support in the same row as that card.
Support ⇒ Exploit.
signalProphet.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

zealousMissionary.name: Zealous Missionary
zealousMissionary.ability: Pas: Cards with your exploit counter provide support to your cards and cannot pose a threat to them.
zealousMissionary.flavorText: The Signal is truth. All else is noise.

overwatch.name: Overwatch
overwatch.ability:
Aim. Reveal one card from any opponent for each aim token you own. 
Take X cards, where X is the highest power of the revealed cards.

repositioning.name: Tactical Maneuver
repositioning.ability:
Move your card to a free cell in the row. 
If the card moved to support, then take 2 cards.

mobilization.name: Mobilization
mobilization.ability:
Gain points in any diagonal. 
For each support in the diagonal, get 1 point and draw 1 card.

inspiration.name: Inspiration
inspiration.ability:
Remove any opponent's counters from your card. This card uses its ability. 
If you removed at least 2 counters, take 2 cards.

dataInterception.name: Data Interception
dataInterception.ability:
Exploit. Reveal one card from any opponent for each exploit token you own. 
If at least one command card is revealed, draw 2 cards.

reconDrone.name: Recon Drone
reconDrone.ability: Trg: When a command is played, you may move this card to any free cell.
reconDrone.flavorText: SynchroTech has created lightweight drones to patrol the streets, but the Hoods have other plans for them.

walkingTurret.name: Walking Turret
walkingTurret.flavorText: This military monster clearly has no place on the city streets.
